name: ELF Collection

This collection is inspired by the movie ELF, which is definitely one of my favorites for the Holiday Season!

This grab bag comes with 5 full size shadows: 
(in order of swatches) 
- SON OF A NUTCRACKER! is a shimmery brown with a fiery copper hue.

These colors are only available in this collection. They are not for individual sale.

All Madd Style Cosmetics are Vegan and Cruelty-Free.

WONDERLUST is a flat black pigment with an outstanding amount of silver sparkle.

This eyeshadow is packed in a 5g sifter jar (approx. 1.2g of product), hand sealed with removable sifter sticker, and labeled after you place your order. We aim to provide you with only the highest quality ingredients in the freshest way possible.
Shadows are filled by volume, not weight.

Ingredients: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Magnesium Myristate.

This shadow is approved for use on eyes, lips and face.
Still unsure what these ingredients are? Find out here: http://tinyurl.com/cosmeticcolors

All Madd Style Cosmetics are Vegan and Cruelty-Free.

name: GIFT CERTIFICATE
description: Looking for the perfect gift for that special someone? Want to give them Madd Style but can't decide exactly what to get? Well now you can let them pick their favorite items! Madd Style Cosmetics gift certificates come in various amounts. Just choose the one that is best for you and we will do the rest! Your recipient will receive a personalized gift certificate with their own unique code. Please allow 24-48 hours for proper delivery. This is for ELECTRONIC delivery only. In the "notes to seller" section before confirming your PayPal payment, please leave the following information: - recipient's name and email address - your (giver's) name - a small message that you would like us to add (optional) Let them choose their own style... with Madd Style!
